raw akas.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción

akas: José José: El Principe de la Canción (original title)
akas from release info: José José: El Principe de la Canción (original title)

1.title: Persiguiendo la nave del olvido

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: A humble boy whose only value was his voice, knew that by recording 'La Nave del Olvido' he would be able to show the world his talent. This is how José José emerged, a prince full of internal demons.

2.title: Un lucero que se apaga

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: José wounds up in third place at the festival, but manages to capture the attention of the public. At the same time, his brother is jealous of his success. Lucero can not cope with the fame of José José.

3.title: Ganar y perder

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Lucero realizes that her dreams are different than those of José. Anel wants to meet José at any cost, while he gets a tour to go to the United States. Kiki lives it partying.

4.title: Una pelirroja debilidad

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: José José receives the golden record from Anel in Los Angeles. She gets in José's eyes, but his heart is with Lucero. Lucero gets a scholarship to go to London to study.

5.title: El juego de Kiki

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: José José and Kiki coincide in Caracas. Too many glasses of wine provoke a compromising situation. Anel is enraged when she sees the photo in the newspaper. Lucero also finds out.

6.title: Anel conquista a José

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Anel is disappointed in José, but goes to see him in Puerto Rico. Lucero's gets jealous. Kiki does witchcraft on José to get him to fall in love with her.

7.title: La trampa de Kiki

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Kiki looks for the dark side of Anel to put her in evidence and push her away from José. Lucero, grateful to Margarita, announces that she is leaving. Chumo confesses to be an alcoholic.

8.title: Lucero se va a Londres

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: The opportunity to sing live on national television, fades. José José makes his debut at El Patio and the three women attend the event. The singer recognizes Lucero as his source of inspiration, but she inevitably has to leave.

9.title: Kiki y José

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: As a singer, José José already earns enough money to buy a house for his family. Two roads open to world fame: TV and the next album in the cinema. Kiki gets her way with him.

10.title: Desencuentros

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: At a reception with Mexico's créme de la créme, Anel provokes Kiki. José José apologizes. Minerva cheats on Gonzalo. Kiki lies to her ex.

11.title: Una propuesta indecorosa

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: José José reeks of alcohol and Margarita detects it. He and Chumo fly to Miami to start the international tour. They both drink on the plane, but Chumo can't handle his alcohol. Minerva steals from Margarita.

12.title: La enfermedad de Chumo

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

12.plot: Chumo promises the Virgin of Guadalupe not to drink for 12 months. But he breaks his promise and El Pelón makes him pay the consequences. José José feels guilty for pushing his friend off the wagon.

13.title: Impulso del corazón

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

13.plot: The forced disappearance of José José causes a crisis in the relationship with Kiki. He makes a decision that will affect him for life. El Pelón is about to cancel José's last show in Panama.

14.title: Chantaje

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

14.plot: The journalist Alfonso Lira warns José José that someone seeks to destroy Kiki's reputation. To avoid it, he asks for money. The singer plays another card. Margarita receives an anonymous check.

15.title: Primero en las listas

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

15.plot: José José leads the popularity lists. He confronts Don Carlos Herrera and returns his check. Kiki is expelled from her home. Minerva pays her doctor to lie about her pregnancy.

16.title: El desplante

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

16.plot: José José surprises Kiki with Javier and gets jealous. She gives him a pipe that could become an uncontrollable demon. On the day of the wedding, Lira has very bad news to publish.

17.title: La boda de José y Kiki

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

17.plot: José José and Kiki get married in a small ceremony. At the record company they are happy for selling of the exclusive photos of the event, but someone leaks information to the fan club.

18.title: Finanzas en rojo

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

18.plot: The diversion of funds brings economic consequences to José José. Kiki decides to interrupt the honeymoon. She reveals that she suffers from epilepsy and takes pills, to avoid attacks.

19.title: La estafa

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

19.plot: Pedro Salas and José José face El Pelón with the evidence in their hands. José becomes a mentor to other singers.

20.title: La cena

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

20.plot: José José fires El Pelón. They offer Chumo to be José's manager. The Sosas have dinner for the first time with the Herreras. José José causes a stir with the signing of autographs.

21.title: Adicciones

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

21.plot: José José deals with Kiki's addictions and tantrums, but as a confirmed romantic, he goes ahead with his marriage. Anel leaves Jorge and thinks about José José.

22.title: Quiebra

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

22.plot: José José discovers that El Pelón stole a million dollars and there is no way to recover the money. Kiki could lose her children, Don Carlos will fight for their custody.

23.title: La vida de Minerva

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

23.plot: Worried about her husband, Kiki goes to the hospital where her sister-in-law is hospitalized, but a group of José José's fans prevents her from seeing him. The life of Minerva and her baby hang by a thread.

24.title: Chumo

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

24.plot: José José is very concerned about his best friend, Chumo, and does not want to travel. Kiki feels displaced and reproaches not to be the priority for José. Chumo has an accident.

25.title: Tributo

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

25.plot: José José pays homage to Chumo, who dies after losing control of his car in an accident. A new fight between José José and Kiki puts the marriage in check.

26.title: Pelirroja tentación

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

26.plot: Anel takes the opportunity to flirt with José, who is having a terrible time with his wife Kiki.

27.title: La denuncia

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

27.plot: Kiki stains the image of José José with the press. She complains that his ex is an alcoholic, a womanizer and does not like responsibilities. Kiki prepares a claim for abandonment of home.

28.title: Colapso

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

28.plot: Like other actresses, Anel undergoes surgery to advance in her career and conquer the heart of José José. The Mexican singer collapses and is taken to the hospital in an emergency.

29.title: Mudanzas

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

29.plot: Anel visits José José in the hospital and the flame of passion is revived. She pampers him and asks him to move in with her.

30.title: Anel y José

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

30.plot: While José José and Anel fully live their romance, the singer suffers a strong pain in his chest that puts him on alert and the actress cancels all her commitments to take care of him.

31.title: Refugio

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

31.plot: José José thanks Anel for her time, love and care. Now that he requires a lot of rehabilitation, discipline and zero excesses, the singer returns to the actress' house. Fanny becomes his manager.

32.title: Quémame los ojos

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

32.plot: José José and Anel go to the recording of the musical TV show Ossart. The singer, worried for not being fully recovered, decides to sing with playback at the TV show, but it does not go well.

33.title: Engaño

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

33.plot: José José becomes angry with Anel when he finds out that she was giving him medication against his addiction to alcohol, without his knowledge. Kiki smashes her ex on the radio.

34.title: Sabrás que te quiero

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

34.plot: Anel captures José in fraganti. She is not jealous or upset with him. Kiki will destroy her rival, Anel, for being a prostitute. José José's tour buses serve as smugglers between Mexico and the US at the border.

35.title: Choque

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

35.plot: José no longer controls his addictions and they take him to a rehab clinic. Anel crashes and José José must pay for the damages, which generates a discussion. Anel kicks him out of her house.

36.title: Una separación

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

36.plot: José and Anel decide to separate for both their sake. Nonetheless, Anel helps José José catch Frank Sinatra's attention to record an album together.

37.title: El divorcio

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

37.plot: José and Anel make a pact. The actress grants him a divorce and he is committed to promoting his career in the music industry. The record label force José to lose his chance to record with Frank Sinatra.

38.title: El futuro

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

38.plot: Anel recognizes that she went to Los Angeles to forget about José José, but she did not succeed. José asks her to have a child with him. Kiki, although novice, becomes a pretentious singer.

39.title: Partida doble

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

39.plot: Anel gets clean of drugs and alcohol during her pregnancy. José José falls off the wagon. Margarita finds out she will be grandmother of both José and Gonzalo.

40.title: Pepito

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

40.plot: José surprises Anel and gives her an engagement ring after they become parents of a healthy boy: Pepito.

41.title: Marido y mujer

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

41.plot: José and Anel get married. Fanny demands separation of goods in the middle of the ceremony. José José discovers that Anel uses drugs.

42.title: Guerra de disqueras

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

42.plot: José José leaves his label of so many years and signs with Arroyo. The distribution of his first album with the new label fails. Nora threatens Pedro for attempting to end José's career.

43.title: Amar y querer

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

43.plot: José José loses control with alcohol and suffers a pre-hepatic coma. To save his life, they inject adrenaline directly into his heart against the doctor's judgment. The artist will receive a platinum record.

44.title: Lo pasado, pasado

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

44.plot: Anel displaces Fanny and manages a tour for José in Central America. José José accepts, but financial failure arrives. Juan Gabriel writes a new song for José.

45.title: Marysol

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

45.plot: José does not support Anel's bad habits. A new daughter arrives, Marysol. José receives another golden record.

46.title: Secretos

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

46.plot: José's albums keep selling like popcorn, but his relation with Anel hits rock bottom. The composer Manuel Alejandro is inspired by José's pain to write the songs for José's next record: Secretos.

47.title: Sinatra

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

47.plot: Anel injects amphetamines under the pretext of losing weight and thus reconquer her husband. José puts his eyes on another woman and gets to meet his idol: Frank Sinatra.

48.title: Kiki

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

48.plot: Manolo convinces Anel to move part of José José's money to her personal account in case of divorce. Anel receives terrible news about Kiki.

49.title: Lo dudo

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

49.plot: José José collapses from exhaustion on his tour, he has no funds to pay for a doctor or a plane ticket to get back home. Anel tells José about Kiki's death and he is devastated.

50.title: Gavilán o paloma

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

50.plot: José José finds out that his brother-in-law, Manolo, is stealing from him. The singer starts shooting the film "Gavilán o Paloma" and signs a contract with mobster Victor Frenk.

51.title: Ingenuo charlatán

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

51.plot: Manolo takes revenge on Abel for having betrayed him. He puts money in José's medicine cabinet and then accuses him of stealing. Anel hires a private detective.

52.title: Mi vida

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

52.plot: José discovers that his brother-in-law does business behind his back, rents his equipment for a million dollars and lives the good life at his expense. José demands an audit.

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

53.plot: José and his family are shocked after the strong earthquake that shook Mexico City in 1985, leaving thousands dead. He helps Gonzalo find his nephew. Manolo takes advantage and gets rid of the evidence that incriminated him.

54.title: Depresión

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

54.plot: Cornered by debts and exploited by his brother-in-law, José José is alone and ill. His only refuge is alcohol again. He arrives in the United States to try to make it outside of Mexico.

55.title: Desesperado

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

55.plot: A specialist diagnoses José José with nodules in his vocal cords. In spite of his risky condition, Anel and Manolo demand José to sing in a previously organized event, putting his voice at risk.

56.title: El amor acaba

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

56.plot: José José dismisses his brother in-law, who suggests Anel to leave her husband, so receive a pension. When José arrives at his house, she files for divorce.

57.title: 40 y 20

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

57.plot: Anel leaves José without a dime. José drowns himself in alcohol, makes a fool of himself at his surprise 30 years of career tribute, and decides to live in the street.

58.title: Sarita

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

58.plot: The singer lives the most painful stage of his life; he even plays Russian Roulette. But fate puts Sara Salazar on his way, when he goes to Miami to recover his finances.

59.title: Lo que no fue no será

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

59.plot: Sarita serves as an engine for José José to resume his life and career, away from alcohol. The singer begins to recover in a health center. Anel, jealous, publicly commits to defame Sarita.

60.title: Seré

episode of.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción (TV Series 2018– )

60.plot: After suffering ups and downs with alcohol, drugs and financial problems, José José becomes an icon of Latin music. He sings at the Latin Grammy Ceremony where they pay homage to his career.

imdb.plot outline: This is the fictionalized life story of the international singing legend "José José", the man known in the entertainment world as El Príncipe de la Canción (The Prince of Song). Featuring his stunning vocals, turbulent past, and world-wide popularity, this drama series is a homage to a true icon of Latin pop music. During his 40-year love affair with the music industry, José gained international fame, sold millions of records, received several Grammy nominations, and even sold out Madison Square Garden and the Radio City Music Hall. His musical notes have become the melody of the romantics in Spanish speaking countries around the world.
imdb.title: José José: El Principe de la Canción
plot: The fictionalized life story of Mexican singer and composer known as José José, based upon his autobiographical memoirs.::Anonymous

This is the fictionalized life story of the international singing legend "José José", the man known in the entertainment world as El Príncipe de la Canción (The Prince of Song). Featuring his stunning vocals, turbulent past, and world-wide popularity, this drama series is a homage to a true icon of Latin pop music. During his 40-year love affair with the music industry, José gained international fame, sold millions of records, received several Grammy nominations, and even sold out Madison Square Garden and the Radio City Music Hall. His musical notes have become the melody of the romantics in Spanish speaking countries around the world.::Jorge Jimenez
